titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 18. 9. 1935
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift (Cambridge Letters, S. 268). Publiziert (Cambridge Letters, S. 268; WiC, S. 249).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I shall come back to Cambridge in about two weeks. I will try to get something ready for publication. Whether successfully, God knows. I intend to stop in Cambridge for the whole academic year and to lecture. If you think it wise, please have my lectures announced.
